name: fastscheme
description: A lightweight HTML/CSS/JS Framework designed to make colorscheming easier

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true src/scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/fastscheme.min.css dist/css/fastscheme.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/fastscheme-nooverrides.min.css dist/css/fastscheme-nooverrides.css

author: Dominik Riedig
